contribution_desc:
This paper describes the design and the study of a collaborative tablet-display system for collaborative activities in the classroom. The system is developed through a participatory design method with educators and is tested in-the-wild in the classroom. The paper discusses findings about supporting both small in-group collaboration and whole-class discussion through shared tablets and a public display, as well as the overall engagement, learning, and practices of collaborative and social skills.
